subject: The investor {{investorName}} submitted his KYC
message: The investor {{investorName}} has submitted information for you to review.

subject: KYC Information submitted
message: KYC submitted successfully, your informations will be reviewed by the issuer of the platform.

subject: The investor {{investorName}} completed KYC
message: {{investorName}} has submitted its KYC Application form; kindly proceed to the platform to approve or reject {{investorName}}'s application

subject: Your application has been approved
message:
We are pleased to inform you, that your application has been approved.
You have now access to the Codefi platform.

subject: Some KYC information needs updating
message:
Our team is working on your onboarding and some information needs further clarification.
Please log onto the platform to review, update and resubmit the relevant information.
The system will guide you through the related items.

subject: Your onboarding was not successful
message: We regret to inform you that we have not been able to conclude the onboarding process based on your given information.

subject: Create your profile
message: Hit the button below to start building your profile and issue digital assets in a few clicks!

subject: Create your profile
message:
Hit the button below to start building your profile and issue digital assets in a few clicks!
The password to use to log in is {{defaultPassword}}

subject: Admin account created
message: You have been invited to join the Codefi Assets platform. Click on the link below to get started.

subject: Create your profile
message:
{{issuerName}} has invited you to join the Codefi platform, a place to invest in digital assets.
Hit the button below to start building your profile!

subject: Carbon Credit Project Review
message: {{name}} has submitted a new Carbon Credit Project. Click the button below to review the project and approve for issuance.

subject: Carbon Credit Project Approved
message: Your Carbon Credit Project has been approved and issued. Click the link below to view your project.

subject: Imported Carbon Credit Project Approved
message: Your imported Carbon Credit Project has been approved and issued. Click the link below to view your project.

subject: Carbon Credit Project Rejected
message: Your Carbon Credit Project has been rejected. Click the link below to view your project.

subject: Carbon Credit Project Token Retired
message: The token(s) of your Carbon Credit Project have been retired. Click the link below to view your project.

subject: Transfer completed
message: We are writing to inform you that {{issuerName}} has updated the balance of {{assetName}} in your account.

subject: New Asset available!
message: We are pleased to invite you to participate in a new investment opportunity that has recently been made available to the Codefi Assets platform investors. To view the investment offering, please follow the link below.

subject: Transfer completed
message: We are writing to inform you that {{issuerName}} has sent you {{quantity}} of {{assetName}} from the account of {{senderName}} to your account.

subject: Transfer completed
message: We are writing to inform you that {{issuerName}} has sent {{quantity}} of {{assetName}} from your account to the account of {{recipientName}}.

subject: New Order
message: The investor {{investorName}} placed a subscription order for {{quantity}} for {{assetName}}. Please review the order.

subject: Order cancelled
message: The investor {{investorName}} has cancelled the subscription order for {{quantity}} for {{assetName}}.

subject: Order cancelled
message: {{issuerName}} has canceled the subscription order for {{quantity}} for {{assetName}}.

subject: Payment confirmed
message: {{issuerName}} has confirmed your payment for the subscription order for {{quantity}} for {{assetName}}.

subject: Order completed
message:
{{issuerName}} has complete the subscription order for {{quantity}} for {{assetName}}.
{{quantity}} of {{assetName}} have been issued to your account.

subject: New sell order
message: The investor {{investorName}} has created an order to {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review and approve or reject the order.

subject: New purchase order
message: {{buyerName}} has created an order to buy {{quantityOrAmount}} {{assetName}}. Please review the order details.

subject: New sell order
message: {{sellerName}} has created an order to sell you {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review the order details.

subject: New sell order
message:
{{sellerName}} has created an order to sell you {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.
To view and progress with this order you must first be onboarded onto the platform.

subject: Sell order approved
message: {{issuerName}} has approved your order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Sell order accepted by buyer
message: {{buyerName}} has accepted to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}} from {{sellerName}}. Please place the tokens/shares on hold.

subject: Buy order accepted by seller
message: {{sellerName}} has accepted an order of {{quantityOrAmount}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Buy order accepted by buyer
message: {{buyerName}} has accepted an order of {{quantityOrAmount}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Payment due
message: Please complete payment to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}} from {{sellerName}}.

subject: Sell order accepted by buyer
message: {{buyerName}} has accepted your order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}} and will now complete payment.

subject: Sell order payment completed
message: {{buyerName}} has completed payment of {{amount}} to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. {{issuerName}} has been notified and will settle the order.

subject: Confirm payment for sell order
message: {{buyerName}} has completed payment of {{amount}} to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review and confirm receipt of payment.

subject: Sell order payment completed
message: Payment of {{amount}} has been completed by {{buyerName}} to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please settle the order.

subject: Sell order payment confirmed
message: {{sellerName}} has confirmed receipt of payment for {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.<bt/>{{issuerName}} has been notified and will now settle this order.

subject: Sell order settled
message: Your purchase of {{quantity}} {{assetName}} from {{sellerName}} has been completed.

subject: Sell order rejected
message: {{issuerName}} has rejected your order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Sell order rejected by buyer
message: {{buyerName}} has rejected your order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Buy order rejected by seller
message: {{sellerName}} has rejected your order to buy {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Sell order rejected by buyer
message: {{buyerName}} has rejected {{sellerName}}'s order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Sell order settled
message: Your order to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}} to {{buyerName}} has been completed.

subject: Nonbinding enquiry submitted
message: {{buyerName}} has made a nonbinding enquiry and request to reserve {{quantity}} credits from {{assetName}}. Click the button below to view the details.

subject: Nonbinding enquiry hold granted
message: The request to reserve {{quantity}} {{assetName}} credits has been approved by the Producer. Click below to view the details.

subject: Nonbinding enquiry updated
message: You have received an offer to purchase {{quantity}} {{assetName}} credits for {{amount}}. Click below to view the details.

subject: Nonbinding enquiry hold rejected
message:
{{sellerName}} has rejected your request to hold {{quantity}} credits for {{assetName}} for the following reason:

Producer Note:
{{comment}}

For more details click the link below.

subject: {{eventType}} event created
message: Your {{eventType}} event for {{assetName}} asset from {{issuerName}} has been created.

subject: {{eventType}} event settled
message: Your {{eventType}} event for {{assetName}} asset from {{issuerName}} has been settled.

subject: {{eventType}} event canceled
message: Your {{eventType}} event for {{assetName}} asset from {{issuerName}} has been canceled.

subject: Your request to list credits
message: Your request to list {{quantityOrAmount}} carbon credits (tC02e) of {{assetName}} is in pending state. We will inform you as soon as it gets approved by {{marketplace}} marketplace

subject: Your listing has been approved
message: Your request to list {{quantityOrAmount}} carbon credits (tC02e) of {{assetName}} on {{marketplace}} marketplace has been approved and ready for sale.

subject: Your listing has been rejected
message: Your request to list {{quantityOrAmount}} carbon credits (tC02e) of {{assetName}} has been rejected by {{marketplace}} marketplace.

subject: New sell order
message: {{agentName}} has created an order for you to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review the order details.

subject: Sell order approved
message: {{sellerFirstName}} has approved the order created by {{agentName}} agent for you to buy {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review the order details.

subject: Trade order created
message: You have successfully created an order for {{sellerName}} to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}. Please review the order details.

subject: Insufficient Balance
message: {{sellerName}} does not have enough balance for the sell order of {{quantity}} {{assetName}}.

subject: Project not on-ramped
message: {{sellerName}} has not on-ramped any carbon credits for the project {{assetName}}.

subject: Trade Order Approved
message: You have successfully approved the trade order created by {{agentName}} to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}

subject: Trade Order Approved
message: {{sellerName}} has approved the trade order created by you to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}

subject: Trade Order Accepted
message: {{buyerName}} has accepted the trade order created by you to buy {{quantity}} {{assetName}}

subject: Trade Order Cancelled
message: {{sellerName}} has cancelled the trade order created by you to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}

subject: Trade Order Cancelled
message: {{agentName}} has cancelled the trade order created for you to sell {{quantity}} {{assetName}}

subject: Trade Order Rejected
message: {{buyerName}} has rejected the trade order to buy {{quantity}} {{assetName}}
